**[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 49 **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 49 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 47 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 44 [Phomandala](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2372) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 473 **Perception** +32; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +35, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +34, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +37, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +37, [First World Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +37, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +35, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +33 **Str** +5 **Dex** +8 **Con** +6 **Int** +5 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +10 **Items** _+2 [glamered](/Equipment.aspx?ID=286) [fortification](/Equipment.aspx?ID=285) [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=147) [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_, elegant robes worth 400 gp --- **AC** 45 [all-around vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=1) **Fort** +33 **Ref** +35 **Will** +32 **HP** 300 **Petrifying Gaze** ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [aura](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=5), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) 30 feet. When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it must attempt a DC 25 Fortitude save. If the creature fails, it becomes [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) 1 for 1 minute. The medusa can deactivate or activate this aura by using a single action, which has the [concentrate](/Actions.aspx?ID=683) trait.
**Biting Snakes** **Trigger** A creature ends its turn adjacent to the medusa. **Effect** The medusa makes a snake fangs Strike against the creature. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** cobra fangs +32 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d12+13 piercing plus Phomandala's venom **Melee** snake fangs +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 4d10+13 piercing plus Phomandala's venom **Primal Spontaneous Spells** DC 41, attack +36 - **Cantrips (9th)** [Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **1st** [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Create Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=53), [Gust of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=143), [Magic Fang](/Spells.aspx?ID=179), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) (4 slots) - **2nd** [Create Food](/Spells.aspx?ID=52), [Enhance Victuals](/Spells.aspx?ID=101), [Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Web](/Spells.aspx?ID=374) (4 slots) - **3rd** [Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Meld into Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=188), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289) (4 slots) - **4th** [Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Restoration](/Spells.aspx?ID=258), [Spell Immunity](/Spells.aspx?ID=296) (4 slots) - **5th** [Chromatic Wall](/Spells.aspx?ID=37), [Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Wall of Ice](/Spells.aspx?ID=364), [Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=365) (4 slots) - **6th** [Baleful Polymorph](/Spells.aspx?ID=17), [Dragon Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=88), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Stone to Flesh](/Spells.aspx?ID=311), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) (4 slots) - **7th** [Eclipse Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=96), [Finger of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=116), [Mask of Terror](/Spells.aspx?ID=185), [Regenerate](/Spells.aspx?ID=248), [Wall of Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=366) (4 slots) - **8th** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Horrid Wilting](/Spells.aspx?ID=152), [Prismatic Wall](/Spells.aspx?ID=234), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172) (4 slots) - **9th** [Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [Disjunction](/Spells.aspx?ID=77), [Massacre](/Spells.aspx?ID=186), [Overwhelming Presence](/Spells.aspx?ID=212), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (4 slots) - **10th** [Revival](/Spells.aspx?ID=262) (1 slot) **Sorcerer Bloodline Spells** DC 41, attack +36, 3 Focus Points - **9th** [Dragon Breath](/Spells.aspx?ID=499), [Dragon Claws](/Spells.aspx?ID=500), [Dragon Wings](/Spells.aspx?ID=501) **Focus Gaze** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) The medusa fixes their glare at a creature they can see within 30 feet. The target must immediately attempt a Fortitude save against the medusa's petrifying gaze. If the creature was already slowed by petrifying gaze before attempting its save, a failed save causes it to be [petrified](/Conditions.aspx?ID=30) permanently. After attempting its save, the creature is then temporarily immune until the start of the medusa's next turn. **Jabberwock Bloodline** Phomandala's sorcerer bloodline is a result of Nyrissa's infusion of the medusa with jabberwock blood. This bloodline functions as the draconic bloodline, but the damage type caused is a line of sonic energy, and she uses the primal spell list instead of the arcane spell list. **Quickened Casting** **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** When Phomandala's next action is to cast a spell that is 7th level or lower, she reduces the number of actions to cast it by 1 (minimum 1 action). **Phomandala's Venom** ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 41 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 6d6 poison damage and [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) 1 (1 round); **Stage 2** 9d6 poison damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round) **Woodland Stride** Even the thickest vines and roots seem to part as Phomandala moves about. Phomandala ignores difficult terrain caused by plants, such as bushes, vines, and undergrowth. Even plants manipulated by magic don't impede her progress.
